info.name: Spinal trigeminal tract
info.description: The spinal trigeminal tract is AKA the trigeminal spinal tract. It consists of small-diameter primary afferent nerve fibers carrying primarily pain and temperature information from the head via the trigeminal nerve (primarily) as well as the facial and glossopharyngeal nerves. The trigeminal spinal (or spinal trigeminal) tract fibers synapse in the trigeminal spinal (or spinal trigeminal) nucleus.
